title: Renew Your Mind
itunes:title: Renew Your Mind
description:
Romans 12 says, “Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.” This means to not think like the world, but to think like Christ. We can't be conformed to this world's culture, instead let's keep conforming to God’s Word and His likeness.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
